PERSONA:
meet james, a 53-year-old african american man living in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. with a high school education or less, james comes from a lower-income background, earning less than $30,000 per year. he is not registered to vote at his current address.

james identifies as a moderate democrat and leans towards conservative views within the party. despite being unaffiliated with any particular religion, he seldom attends religious services. james is living with his partner and has no hispanic or latino origins, having been born in the united states.

while not actively involved in volunteerism, james spends his free time exploring the vibrant metropolitan area he calls home. he values his independence and takes pride in his ability to navigate life's challenges with resilience. james cherishes the close-knit community he has built around him, finding solace in the familiar faces and shared experiences of his neighbors.
